decision_conditions:
This decision should be read along side permission ref: P2020/1610/S73 dated 24/12/2020.

The description of development shall read as follows:

Comprehensive redevelopment of the site following the demolition of existing building and structures to construct six new buildings ranging from 3 to 12 storeys in height to provide residential floorspace (Class C3), office floorspace (Class B1) and flexible retail and community floorspace (Class A1, A2, A3, D1 and D2) with associated energy centre, waste and storage areas, vehicle and cycle parking, hard and soft landscaping to provide public and private areas of open space, alterations to the public highway and construction of new dedicated vehicle ramp to basement level to service Royal Mail operations, construction of an acoustic roof deck over existing servicing yard and all other necessary excavation and enabling works.
description:
Non-material amendment to planning permission ref: P2020/1610/S73 dated 24/12/2020:

'Comprehensive redevelopment of the site following the demolition of existing buildings & structures to construct six new buildings ranging from 3 to 12 storeys in height to provide 38,015sqm (GIA) of residential floorspace (Class C3), 4,260sqm (GIA) of office floorspace (Class B1), 1,428sqm (GIA) of flexible retail & community floorspace, (Classes A1, A2, A3, D1 and D2) with associated energy centre, waste and storage areas, vehicle & cycle parking, hard & soft landscaping to provide public & private areas open space, alterations to the public highway &construction of a new dedicated vehicle ramp to basement level to service Royal Mail operations, construction of an acoustic roof deck over the existing service yard & all other necessary excavation & enabling works.'

The proposed amendment seeks to remove reference to floor space and unit numbers from the description.
